title: Bone Breaker Tycoon
description: Bone Breaker Tycoon is an arcade game where you throw crowds of cartoon people (not real people) off mountains and earn cash for all the injuries they suffer on the way down. Use cash to hire more crowd members, increase insurance payouts, buy enhancements and gain access to bigger and better mountains. You can even customize your crowd by naming and coloring each person in your crowd.
